dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 4939 IH: To amend title 10, United States Code, to provide for the membership of the Commandant of the Coast Guard on the Joint Chiefs of Staff.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Tipton introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to provide for the membership of the Commandant of the Coast Guard on the Joint Chiefs of Staff.

section.header: Membership of Commandant of the Coast Guard on the Joint Chiefs of Staff
section.text: Section 151(a) of title 10, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following new paragraph:

paragraph.text: The Commandant of the Coast Guard.
